snippet.title: Prologue Showcase Teaser: "The Banquet of Opulent Dreams" | Project: Eden’s Garden「模倣」
snippet.description:
This is the full showcase of both rooms that where featured in the latest devlog. Stay tuned for more showcases in the future!

Project: Eden's Garden is a non-profit Danganronpa fangame. Taking the formula of the murder-mystery video game and applying it to an entirely new world, with new characters and stories to tell, this is a small project that is dedicated to recreating the magic the works that inspired it.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
» CREDITS «

✦ Game Director: Tako0mari
▸ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Tako0mari
▸ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZCy…

✦ Co-Director: Richard “Juvey” Hayne
▸Twitter: https://twitter.com/JuveyD

✦ Video Editor: Mr. Universe (Steven)
▸ Twitter: https://twitter.com/universe_edm
▸ Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/mruniverseedm
▸ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOw_…

✦ Producer/Technical Artist: Calvin “Shade” Ringeisen
▸ Twitter: https://twitter.com/ShadeCRT
▸ ArtStation: https://www.artstation.com/de_shade


✦ Composer: Hayden Graves
▸ Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/haydenggraves
▸ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@hggraves
▸ JWPepper: https://www.jwpepper.com/myscore/hayd

✦ Composer: Robby Good
▸ Twitter/Instagram: https://twitter.com/RobboRites
▸ Website: https://robbygoodmusic.com
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Prologue Showcase Teaser: "The Banquet of opulent Dreams" | Project: Eden’s Garden「模倣」
